import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './to' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id, title, city, photo, price, featured, avgRating, reviews } = tour return (
Featured
{avgRating} ({reviews.length})
{title}
${price} /per person
 TourCard
) } export default TourCard
